title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the lightweight server that bundles, runs and serves large language models locally with a single CLI.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python library that wraps the Ollama HTTP API for easy local LLM inference in notebooks or apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk to a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you plug any Ollama model into LangChain chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface that connects to a local Ollama server for multi-model chatting, file uploads and admin.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing synchronous & asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem that wraps the Ollama REST API for Rails or Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that adds readline, syntax highlighting and conversation history on top of the Ollama API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model for private coding assistance.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and ASP.NET Core sample showing how to call Ollama from C# with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model caching.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub for running Ollama in a container with one command.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI to chat over your documents locally.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot frontend that streams responses from Ollama with Tailwind styling and dark mode.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and common models for reproducible deployments on NixOS or via nix-shell.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger.io CI example that spins up an Ollama service container and runs model tests inside a pipeline.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API with Tokio.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from the OpenAPI spec for integrating Ollama into Go services.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready to pull into Ollama.
